estimatedNumberOfCells.name: Estimated Number of Cells
estimatedNumberOfCells.definition: The number of barcodes associated with at least one cell
estimatedNumberOfCells.notes: Higher or lower than expected values may indicate inaccurate cell count, cell lysis, or failures during GEM generation.

meanReadsPerCell.name: Mean Reads per Cell
meanReadsPerCell.definition: The total number of sequenced reads divided by the number of barcodes associated with cell-containing partitions
meanReadsPerCell.notes: The necessary sequencing depth per cell depends on the cell type (high or low RNA) and the desired analysis.

numberOfReads.name: Number of Reads
numberOfReads.definition: The total number of reads in the sequencing run
numberOfReads.notes: This is the total number of reads in the sequencing run

validBarcodes.name: Valid Barcodes
validBarcodes.definition: The number of barcodes that passed the initial barcode filtering
validBarcodes.notes: This is the number of barcodes that passed the initial barcode filtering

sequencingSaturation.name: Sequencing Saturation
sequencingSaturation.definition: The fraction of reads that map to valid barcodes
sequencingSaturation.notes: This is the fraction of reads that map to valid barcodes

q30BasesInBarcodes.name: Q30 Bases in Barcodes
q30BasesInBarcodes.definition: The fraction of bases in the barcodes that have a quality score of at least 30
q30BasesInBarcodes.notes: This is the fraction of bases in the barcodes that have a quality score of at least 30

q30BasesInRnaRead.name: Q30 Bases in RNA Read
q30BasesInRnaRead.definition: The fraction of bases in the RNA reads that have a quality score of at least 30
q30BasesInRnaRead.notes: This is the fraction of bases in the RNA reads that have a quality score of at least 30

q30BasesInUmi.name: Q30 Bases in UMI
q30BasesInUmi.definition: The fraction of bases in the UMI that have a quality score of at least 30
q30BasesInUmi.notes: This is the fraction of bases in the UMI that have a quality score of at least 30

readsMappedToGenome.name: Reads Mapped to Genome
readsMappedToGenome.definition: The number of reads that map to the genome
readsMappedToGenome.notes: This is the number of reads that map to the genome

readsMappedConfidentlyToGenome.name: Reads Mapped Confidently to Genome
readsMappedConfidentlyToGenome.definition: The number of reads that map to the genome with high mapping quality
readsMappedConfidentlyToGenome.notes: This is the number of reads that map to the genome with high mapping quality

readsMappedConfidentlyToIntergenicRegion.name: Reads Mapped Confidently to Intergenic Regions
readsMappedConfidentlyToIntergenicRegion.definition: The number of reads that map to intergenic regions with high mapping quality
readsMappedConfidentlyToIntergenicRegion.notes: This is the number of reads that map to intergenic regions with high mapping quality

readsMappedConfidentlyToIntronicRegions.name: Reads Mapped Confidently to Intronic Regions
readsMappedConfidentlyToIntronicRegions.definition: The number of reads that map to intronic regions with high mapping quality
readsMappedConfidentlyToIntronicRegions.notes: This is the number of reads that map to intronic regions with high mapping quality

readsMappedConfidentlyToExonicRegions.name: Reads Mapped Confidently to Exonic Regions
readsMappedConfidentlyToExonicRegions.definition: The number of reads that map to exonic regions with high mapping quality
readsMappedConfidentlyToExonicRegions.notes: This is the number of reads that map to exonic regions with high mapping quality

readsMappedConfidentlyToTranscriptome.name: Reads Mapped Confidently to Transcriptome
readsMappedConfidentlyToTranscriptome.definition: The number of reads that map to the transcriptome with high mapping quality
readsMappedConfidentlyToTranscriptome.notes: This is the number of reads that map to the transcriptome with high mapping quality

readsMappedAntisenseToGene.name: Reads Mapped Antisense to Gene
readsMappedAntisenseToGene.definition: The number of reads that map to the opposite strand of a gene
readsMappedAntisenseToGene.notes: This is the number of reads that map to the opposite strand of a gene
